document.full_text: the united states must move fast on its planned drive to revive middle east talks before palestinians seek recognition as a state, a spokesman for palestinian president mahmoud abbas said on wednesday.
document.title: new u.s. peace push must come soon: palestinians
lines_and_colors: the united states must move fast on its planned drive to revive middle east talks before palestinians seek recognition as a state, a spokesman for palestinian president mahmoud abbas said on wednesday.
